pageContent:
Ganesh M
Automation QA Engineer
Profile
A seasoned Software Tester with 7 years of hands-on experience in 
 API,  Web and Mobile application automation. Specialized in Visual 
regression and functional testing. Proven proficiency in developing 
automation scripts, adept at defect identification, and committed to 
ensuring client expectations are consistently met with high-quality 
software solutions.
Professional Summary
•Good knowledge of Rest API testing, ensuring the robustness and 
reliability of backend functionalities.
•Extensive experience in web application automation testing, 
employing Selenium and Katalon Studio to enhance testing 
efficiency.
•Practical experience in mobile application testing for Android and 
IOS apps using Appium.
•Proficient in version control tools, with a track record of successful 
collaboration using Git and Microsoft Azure repositories.
•Substantial experience in visual regression testing, leveraging 
tools such as Katalon Studio, and LambdaTest.

collaboration using Git and Microsoft Azure repositories.
•Substantial experience in visual regression testing, leveraging 
tools such as Katalon Studio, and LambdaTest.
•Hands-on experience with API automation testing tools 
RestAssured and Katalon Studio.
•Adept understanding of CI/CD tools, with proficiency in Jenkins 
and Azure Pipelines.
•Expertise in integrating Selenium WebDriver with testing 
frameworks like JUnit & TestNG.
•Proven capability in data-driven testing and cross-browser testing 
using Katalon Studio and Selenium WebDriver automation tools.
•Hands-on experience with IDEs such as IntelliJ and Eclipse.
•Execution of Regression and Smoke test suites via Azure jobs in 
continuous integration tools like Azure Pipelines.
•Demonstrated ability in parallel test execution using Selenium 
WebDriver, Katalon Studio on Selenium Grid, LambdaTest.
•Experience in developing BDD scripts with Cucumber and writing 
step definitions for behavior.

WebDriver, Katalon Studio on Selenium Grid, LambdaTest.
•Experience in developing BDD scripts with Cucumber and writing 
step definitions for behavior.
•Proficiency in designing comprehensive test cases to ensure 
thorough testing coverage.
•Demonstrated skill in Bug Reporting and Bug Tracking, utilizing 
Jira and Azure DevOps for efficient issue resolution.
•Active involvement in training and mentoring initiatives, sharing 
knowledge and best practices to empower team members and 
enhance overall team competence.
•Self-motivated and quick learner, adept at adapting to new 
environments and projects with minimal supervision.

Projects
Property Point, Ryan LLC
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Platform : Property Point
Role        : QA Engineer Automation
Testing Tools : Selenium Webdriver, Appium, RestAssured
Project Description:
                      Property Point is the industry-leading solution for 
U.S. real and personal property tax management. A centralized source 
for tax assessments, appeal activity, tax bills, tax savings, and refunds 
providing access to everything from upcoming deadlines to appeal 
decisions and tax bill payments.
My Responsibilities:
•Performed automated and manual testing on software products 
to uncover and report defects.

decisions and tax bill payments.
My Responsibilities:
•Performed automated and manual testing on software products 
to uncover and report defects.
•Verified and validated software products to ensure compliance 
with customer requirements.
•Understanding the application and its components by executing 
the functional test cases manually.
•Automated Rest API’s using RestAssured libraries, ensuring the 
robustness and reliability of backend functionalities.
•Design and development of test automation scripts using the 
tools Selenium and Appium by following the test automation 
guidelines.
•Reporting any defects on day to day basis.
•Writing parameterized XPaths to handle AG Grids.
•Maintenance and execution of test automation suites on cloud 
browsers via Azure DevOps pipeline
•Scheduling Azure jobs to execute smoke and sanity automation 
test suites on a daily basis
•Involving in internal peer reviews
•Participating in automation review meetings.

•Scheduling Azure jobs to execute smoke and sanity automation 
test suites on a daily basis

automation testing efforts and open issues to be resolved

Shopper Stop Limited, Shopper Stop
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Platform : Marketplace Integration(E-Commerce)
Role : QA Engineer Automation
Testing Tools : Selenium, Appium(Android & IOS), Postman, 
RestAssured, Jmeter
Project Description:
           SSL is a new E-Commerce platform envisioned by Shoppers Stop. 
This platform has developed through Hybris Channel. It enables users 
to perform the bookings of various products as per their requirement 
through various channels like Web portals, and Mobile Apps.
My Responsibilities:
•Understanding the Requirements of the application.
•Tested back end api's using the  tools   - Postman and Rest Assured 
for automation
•Used Selenium to generate automated test scripts for web 
application.
•Used Appium to generate automated test scripts for Android and 
IOS applications.
•Developed automation scripts using the page object model

application.

IOS applications.
•Developed automation scripts using the page object model 
approach using the unit testing framework testNG.
•Developed automation regression test suite for the application
•Sent test execution status reports on daily and weekly basis 
through company prescribed format.
•Involved in internal peer reviews of the test automation scripts
•Used JMeter to perform a Performance test of the application.
DXP, Ryan LLC
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Platform : DXP
Role : QA Automation Engineer
Testing Tools : Katalon Studio Enterprise, Visual studio
Project Description:
The Ryan Digital Experience Platform (DXP), is a global tax services, 
software, and technology platform providing an integrated suite of 
federal, state, local, and international tax services. 
My Responsibilities:
•Understanding the requirements

software, and technology platform providing an integrated suite of 
federal, state, local, and international tax services. 
My Responsibilities:
•Understanding the requirements
•Preparation functional test cases and test data
•Defect reporting on daily basis if any
•Execution of manual test cases.
•Developed reusable keywords, reducing the amount of time 
needed for setting up and executing tests.
•Implemented automated testing using Katalon Studio Enterprise.
•Execution of automated test suites and maintenance
•Involved in internal peer reviews of automated scripts
